main.name: Morgan Johnson
main.description: Curious, self-driven and ready to solve tomorrow's problems through design
main.bio: I`m a Florida based UX Designer that enjoys making meaningful designs through every day life. UX spiked my interest after 7 years in the motorcycle industry. Learning how to simplify a process to be more efficient while digging into the design process, and learning all the 'whys' behind the design is my new obsession. Design solutions are everywhere, who would have thought a red 'Go' button would make me change my whole career.

work.title: Office Manager
work.description: In charge of balancing accounts and paying bills, as well as factory rebate reconciliation. Responsible for running reports and making sure manufacturers and suppliers are paid accordingly. Assisted General Manager with inventory management and dealer transfers. Title and Registration for all sales units.
